ext_descriptions.ext_description: A deprecated_interfaced_data_types is a set of names of interfaced data types that are kept in this edition in order to ensure upward compatability. Their usage is deprecated.
A deprecated_constructed_data_types is a set of names of enumerated and select data types that are kept in this edition in order to ensure upward compatability. Their usage is deprecated.
A deprecated_entity_data_types is a set of names of entity data types that are kept in this edition to ensure upward compatability. Their usage is deprecated.
A cc_design_approval is a type of . It relates an approval to a particular piece of product data.
a set of approved_items which identify the data to which the approval applies.

A cc_design_certification is a type of
that assigns a
to a product that is supplied by an external organization.

a set of certified_items which identify
entities to which the certification is being assigned.

A cc_design_contract is a type of
that relates a contract to a .
a set of contracted_items which identify the versions of particular products to which the contract is assigned.

A cc_design_date_and_time_assignment is a type of
that relates a
to a particular piece of product data.
a set of date_time_items which identify the data to which the date and time is assigned.

A cc_design_person_and_organization_assignment is a type of
that relates a
to a particular piece of product data.

a set of cc_person_organization_items which identify data to which the
is related.

The
function that correlates roles of persons and organizations to elements of product data shall be satisfied.

A cc_design_security_classification is a type of . It relates a
to a particular piece of product data.

a set of cc_classified_items which identify the versions or definition relationships of particular products to which the
is assigned.

A cc_design_specification_reference is a type of
that relates a reference to a specification to a complete definition of a product or to some aspect of its shape.

a set of
and / or
to which the specification reference applies.

A change is a type of
that identifies the work_items that have been incorporated into the design and, as a result, have established a new version of the product.
a set of work_items which identify versions of particular products which were created as a result of the incorporation of the change.

A change_request is a type of
that is a formal notification of a desire for a modification to a particular piece of product data.
a set of change_request_items which identify versions of particular products to be changed.

A design_context is a type of
that defines a life cycle stage of design as the frame of reference for
entities.

the
of the design_context entity shall contain the value 'design'.

A design_make_from_relationship is a type of
that specifies that one product's design has been derived from another product's design. The use of the design_make_from_relationship also implies that the physical product resulting from the manufacture of the
is to be used as the basis for the manufacture of the .

A mechanical_context is a type of
that is applicable to those products that are mechanical. The use of this entity defines a viewpoint for the context of a product. It is not intended to be a classification or categorization of a type of product. The definition of the
to be mechanical using this entity is specifying the way that the product acts within the data exchange.
A printed circuit assembly is defined in a mechanical context when its physical properties such as shape are of interest, and are defined so that its fit within the assembly in which it used may be specified. Other properties of the printed circuit assembly such as connectivity requirements and functional requirements would not be specified in a mechanical context.

the
of the mechanical_context entity shall contain the value 'mechanical'.
A mated_part_relationship is a type of , of , of , of , and of .
the set of s, that represent the mating materials.
the inherited attribute assigned_group that is redeclared as derived to this entity instance.
the inherited attribute definition that is redeclared as derived to this entity instance.
the inherited attribute assigned_group that is redeclared as derived to this entity instance.

A start_request is a type of
that is a formal notification of a desire to begin a new design for a product or group of products.
a set of start_request_items which identify the versions of particular products.

A start_work is a type of
that identifies the start_requests that have been fulfilled and, as a result, have established a new version of a product.
a set of work_items which identify versions of products that are to be created as a result of the start of the work.

A supplied_part_relationship is a type of
that relates the identifications of two products and specifies that one is the identification used by the internal design organization and the other is the identification used by a supplier.

The ap242_application_protocol_definition_required rule ensures that at least one
is specified for the application protocol with this schema name.

At least one instance of
shall be refered by one instance of
which contains the instance of
as its
attribute and has a
with this schema name.

ext_description.p:
The cc_design_person_and_organization_correlation boolean function returns true if the
is coordinated with the type of entity selected in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
the
to be checked.

The dimensioning_data_requires_document rule specifies the allowed external standards that may be used when the application context is 'Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing Product Specification' and when the role associated with the document is 'dimensioning standard'.
The allowed external standard shall be ASME Y14.41-2003, ASME Y14.5M-1994, or ISO 1101: 2004.
Each product definition referenced by a document reference by this rule shall also be referenced by the relevant product definition context association.

The subtype_mandatory_shape_representation rule requires all
instances to be either , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , or
or contain only
entities in their respective sets of items or be the representation of a
or a . The rule defines the constraint that establishes the different types of representations allowed for shapes in this part of ISO 10303.

Each instance of
shall be either a , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , or
entities in its set of items or be the representation of a
or .
